name: Avoid The Zombies!
description: An endless 2D game. You control your character with arrows and A, D and W keys. Zombies are spawned every 1-5 seconds and to avoid them you have to jump over them using the W key. There is much more stuff to it but it would be better if you tested them in game. It will be better if you make it full screen. Update: You can now respawn with R key and not only the respawn button.
